channel.title: Ftp Misconfiguration on Christian.V
channel.description: Recent content in Ftp Misconfiguration on Christian.V

item.title: OnSystemShellDredd
item.description: Platform : Proving Grounds Level : Easy Name : Onsystemshelldredd Reconnaissance: A quick rustscan shows 2 open ports, 2 and 61000.![[ksnip_20231106-031514.png]] Scanning : Performed a nmap scan on the target to identify the services running, but nmap scanned and identify only one port which was ftp and not the other one. but i ran a seperate nmap scan against the port and nmap didnt identify the service running on that port.
